LanguageData.VFE.CannotPlaceOnWall: Cannot be place inside a wall.
LanguageData.VFE.ComputerNeedChairsDesc: One of your computers does not have any adjacent chair.\n\nBuild adjacent chair or stool to allow your colonists to use the computer.
LanguageData.VFE.RouletteTableOnWallDesc: One of your roulette tables is adjacent to an obstruction that will prevent colonists from using it.\n\nA roulette table needs clear space around it on all sides to be usable.
